summary:
Received CERTIFICATE OF COMMEMORATION for unblemished service 

Received Best Employee certificate

Got Appreciation for working round the clock for 82 days during strike period by the labours, technicians and operators, etc. during the year 1980

Effort and sincere work done to increase milk Procurement from the level of 20,000 LPD to 1 lakh litres during the period 1988 to 1995

Organised more than 500 Milk Producers Co operative Societies in the villages for the benefit of milk producing farmers

Organised more than 10,000 Milch animal loans from the banks to the farmers

During the period 2001 to 2006 as a Deputy General Manager Marketing, the milk sales level of Madurai Dairy increased to 175000 litres per day from the level of 60,000 litres per day. This is the highest level of milk sales increase by one district union in India. It has been a role model as Success Story to all State Federations and District Unions in India

Received National Productivity Council Award for the above achievement during the year 2004

Turnover, profitability, and financial viability were stabilised in all units wherever i have worked

As general Manager Viluppuram, converted a loss making unit to a profit making unit during the period 2010-2011

As General Manager Kanyakumari Unit , Infrastructure facilities for products manufacturing installed. Recored the highest profit during the year 2015-2016

Due to my dynamic and enthusiastic approach, result oriented work records are recommended to Government of India form the State government of Tamilnadu to work as Assistant Private Secretary to the Honourable Minister for Surface transport, Government of India during the period 1998-1999

Deputed to work with Honourable Minister of Dairy Development, Government of Tamilnadu as a Deputy General manager co ordination for a period of 3 yrs during 2012-2015

school.name: Indian Council of Agricultural Institute - National Dairy Research Institute (NDRI), Bangalore
Secondary School leaving Certificate, Government High School, Saptur, Madurai

company.name: Tamilnadu Dairy Development department, TCMPF Limited

profile_positions.company: Tamilnadu Dairy Development department, TCMPF Limited
profile_positions.title: Senior Advisory Consultant

profile_positions.company: TamilNadu Dairy development department, TCMPF Limited
profile_positions.description:
Worked for 10yrs in the cader of Deputy General Manager in various fields of Dairy industry like Marketing, Planning, Products, General Manager of Dairy units , etc. with significant achievements

Woked as General Manager of Viluppuram district,India Co operative Milk producers union limited, handles 3lakh litres of milk per day, the district which was not a financially viable one was turned into a profitable unit during my one yr tenure

Tanjavore District Co operative Milk producers union limited also turned into progressive dairy unit during my period

Kanyakurmari District Co operative Milk producers union limited, a liquid Milk handling unit converted into full fledged Dairy unit with all Infrastructure facilities for Products manufacturing

The highest profit achieved in the Union during my 2yrs Tenure as General Manager

During the period 2001 to 2006 as a Deputy General Manager Marketing, the milk sales level of Madurai Dairy increased to 175000 litres per day from the level of 60,000 litres per day. This is the highest level of milk sales increase by one district union in India. It has been a role model as Success Story to all State Federations and District Unions in India

National Productivity Council Award for this achievement has been honoured during the year 2004
profile_positions.title: Deputy General Manager

profile_positions.company: TamilNadu Dairy development department, TCMPF Limited
profile_positions.description:
Worked for 12.6yrs as Assistant general Manager, the direct in charge of Dairy Units

Worked in various Dairy units handling Milk from 1lakh LPD to 3lakh litres per day

Worked as a product manufacturing in charge, handling the work smoothly and effectively

Promoted to next cader Deputy General Manager(Dairy)
profile_positions.title: Assistant General Manager

profile_positions.company: TamilNadu Dairy development department, TCMPF Limited
profile_positions.description:
Worked as Assistant Manager in Dairy Processing unit for 5 yrs

Dairy unit comprising of Milk seperation, Butter manufacturing, Ghee Manufacturing, Milk Powder Production and By-Products production

Worked as Assistant Manager in the field of Milk Procurement, Formation of Milk societies in Rural areas, milk collection, chilling, processing, dispatch, etc. for 5 yrs

Promoted to next cader as Assistant  General Manager
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager (Dairy and milk Production)

profile_positions.company: TamilNadu Dairy development department, TCMPF Limited
profile_positions.description:
Worked as a Junior Dairy Officer for 5.6 Yrs in the Dairy Unit handling 2.5 lakh litres of Milk per day, selling 1.5 lakh litres of Milk per day, converting 1 lakh litre milk into products

worked in milk chilling centres handling 10,000 LPD (Litres per day) to 75,00 LPD, handled effectively and efficiently

Promoted to next cader Assistant Manager (Dairy)
profile_positions.title: Junior Dairy Officer
